title: Cold-Process Soap Making
description:
In this 3-hour workshop we will make our own soap using the cold-process method. We will combine a blend of natural oils and lye to make our own soap base from scratch and liven it up with an assortment essential oils and colorants.

Participants will learn:
  • how to work with lye safely
  • the basics of soap-making chemistry
  • the know-how to continue experimenting on their own

Everyone will leave with about 1 pound of their very own amazing soap.

All materials are included in the cost of the workshop.
